name: EchoChoke
description: automatically roasts your fails and sends a screenshot to discord

disable_roasts.name: Disable Roasts
disable_roasts.description: turn this on if the roasts are hurting your feelings

enable_ping.name: Enable Role Ping
enable_ping.description: Ping a role when you choke hard

ping_threshold.name: Ping Percentage
ping_threshold.description: Pings only if you die at or above this %

role_id.name: Discord Role ID
role_id.description: The ID of the role to ping (Right click role -> Copy ID)
